programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Mount Kenya: African Heart of Ice
programme.desc: Mount Kenya soars over 5km into the air. It is the second highest mountain in Africa. At its summit, temperatures fluctuate from over 30 degrees celsius to below freezing.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Zanzibar: Land of Giants
programme.desc: The Zanzibar Archipelago has been labeled the most exotic island chain in the world. Pristine sands and azure blue sea make it a much loved holiday destination. /The Caribbean is a tropical paradise. Each of the 7,000 islands are unique.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Australian Alps
programme.desc: It may come as a surprise to non-Australians that the island continent renowned for its flat plains and searing deserts has snow-capped mountains at all.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Thailand: The Wild Heart
programme.desc: Thailand is a land of extremes. A country shaped by wild forces, where animals face tough challenges to survive. Tropical rainforests, primeval caves, mangrove swamps, and rocky shorelines provide homes for remarkable creatures.

programme.title: Jumper

programme.title: Bottle Shock

programme.desc: The dying days of steam, and how the railways fought back.

programme.title: Warship: Life at Sea: Episode 1
programme.desc: Heading out to the Med and the Black Sea, the 280 men and women onboard face a heart attack, a man overboard, and a show of force from Russian airplanes.

programme.title: Warship: Life at Sea
programme.desc: The ship and its crew are heading towards Crimea, when a Russian ship HMS Duncan has been tracking suddenly disappears. As they get closer to Crimea, the situation escalates

programme.title: Warship: Life at Sea: Episode 3
programme.desc: Reports that a chemical weapon has been used in Salisbury changes the mood. When another chemical attack takes place in Syria, the ship goes to action stations for the first time.

programme.title: Warship: Life at Sea: Episode 4
programme.desc: The crew stand-off with a Russian warship over Syria, and young sailor Danny tries for his first promotion, but chef Liam gets in trouble for drinking and might lose shore leave.

programme.title: Britain's Bloodiest Dynasty: Betrayal
programme.desc: Historian Dan Jones reveals how Henry II founded the Plantagenet dynasty.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 3
programme.desc: Tonight on My Kitchen Rules, we travel to Queensland to find sisters Tanja Smith and Genevieve Latham in the kitchen racing the clock to get their three-course meal out on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 4
programme.desc: Tonight on My Kitchen Rules, we travel to Western Australia where husband and wife team Marc and Natalie Ferron welcome us into their fiery kitchen.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 5
programme.desc: Tonight on My Kitchen Rules, we travel to South Australia to witness flatmates Paul Wood and Melissa Heilmanns finesse in the kitchen.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 6
programme.desc: The competition heats up as judges Pete Evans and Manu Feildel call in at another instant restaurant tonight on My Kitchen Rules.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 7
programme.desc: The competition heats up as judges Pete Evans and Manu Feildel call in at another instant restaurant tonight on My Kitchen Rules.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 8
programme.desc: The competition heats up as judges Pete Evans and Manu Feildel call in at another instant restaurant tonight on My Kitchen Rules.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Dead Men Do Talk
programme.desc: Profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts and the procedures they use to solve murders and other mysteries in minutes or centuries after they happen.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Scent Of The Kill
programme.desc: A dog can be a dead man's best friend. Dogs have been trained to sniff out corpses, drugs, explosives, and missing persons. They're often the first to find the essential clue that sets an investigation in motion.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Aim
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own fingerprint, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Toxic Death
programme.desc: Sometimes, the cause of death does not match the scene of the crime. When an untraceable poison is used to commit murder, homicide detectives turn to forensic toxicologists to follow a killer's tracks and expose a toxic death.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stranger Than Fiction
programme.desc: A millionaire is found dead, murdered for a stash of buried silver. A young woman dates violent men, only to be killed by her best friend.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of wannabe chefs through a series of gruelling challenges as they battle for the ultimate prize of a head chef position at his Las Vegas restaurant. The two teams are challenged to throw a party fit for a princess.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs compete to participate in a photo shoot and host a dinner for members of the Army.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two teams must create their own menus for the evening service. Despite a lacklustre selection, the female team threatens to outshine the men when it comes to food service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs create ethnic dishes with select ingredients; a team falls behind before dinner service begins.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' palates with a blind taste test; Ramsay presents an unexpected challenge in order to determine who gets immunnity.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chef with the best dish earns immunity; the chefs prepare a meal for TV host Maria Menounos and actor Jeremy Sisto; one team's service flags during dinner.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: A new client comes into the picture with a vintage desire; a hand-built motorcycle in the vein of early Harley Davidsons, but with a Full Custom twist. And later, Ian pushes the envelope with a cool electric bike build for himself.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An old client brings in Ian to build a classic 54 Chevy pickup truck from the ground up with some major custom upgrades.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: One of Ians most infamous show cars, Space Junkie, comes back to into the shop in a bizarre turn of events. The gem is in desperate need of rehab and Ian brings it back to life, better than ever, with some major reworking!

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel delivers the fabrication goods as he transplants an old 1948' cab onto a modern roll-off truck and creates one bad-ass trash truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel brings his wild fabrication skills into the world of Volkswagen bugs, as he turns a stock bug into a full custom.

programme.title: Andromeda: Chaos and the Stillness of It
programme.desc: Dylan, Rhade and Beka work together to rescue Trance from Methus-2 and Harper from General Burma.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Heart of the Journey (Part 1)
programme.desc: The crew finally makes it out of the Seefra system and discovers Dylan is the last Paradine.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The final battle to save the New Systems Commonwealth begins.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: After being left stranded near a black hole, Captain Dylan Hunt is discovered by a mercenary salvage ship and finds he has been frozen in time for 300 years.

programme.title: Andromeda: An Affirming Flame
programme.desc: Dylan protects the Andromeda from mercenaries while Beka starts to wonder if they are fighting for the wrong side.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Seeking Siegfried
programme.desc: Katikati man Siegfried Newman disappeared on February 25, 2008, after he had dropped his sons Thomas, 9, and Oliver, 7, at Pahoia School. Police carried out a three-day search but found no sign of him.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Warts and All
programme.desc: Bryce resorts to blackmail to force Alex and Stevie into signing a pre-nuptial agreement. Stevie takes drastic action to avoid being pigeonholed as "Mrs. Alex Ryan".

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Conflict of Interests
programme.desc: Alex takes drastic action to lodge his marriage licence application in time.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Flesh And Stone
programme.desc: Grace kidnaps a government official to prevent the toxic dump going ahead. Regan fights to save Drover's as her relationship with Grace and Lyle reaches crisis point.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: All's Fair In Love And War
programme.desc: Old wounds are opened when Stevie's estranged mother visits. Passions are aroused when Stevie and Alex organise a laser skirmish for their combined bucks and hens' party.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Ever After
programme.desc: Alex and Stevie's big day is finally here! Will Alex get out of jail in time for the service? Alex's sister tries to ruin the wedding and take control of Killarney while Rose gives Stevie a pre-wedding makeover - with disastrous results.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Grace Under Fire
programme.desc: Grace is convinced she has cursed Drovers Run when a series of bizarre plagues hit the farm. It's pride versus prejudice when Grace locks horns with a rich new neighbour, Heath Barrett.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the worlds largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is cut throat. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canadas largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Children in the Attic
programme.desc: One of the oldest yacht clubs in the USA is also one of the most haunted! A mother and her son are entangled in phenomena involving a frightening family from the past with a strange story to tell.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 6
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Darker Learning
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been called to investigate Southern Vermont College in Bennington, Vermont. The legend of a mysterious love triangleand suicidescould be at the root of frightening paranormal activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts of Christmas Past
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS gets intothe Christmas spirit at New Hampshire's Christmas Farm Inn.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Island Hopper
programme.desc: When a brother bondsman from Washington State calls Dog for help tracking a runner in search of fun in the sun on the tropical paradise of Kauai, the team gets on the case. Dog's only problem? No leads!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Nice Guys Finish Last
programme.desc: Dog and team help out a bondsman friend whose client jumped bail, but the target is a blank slate. Are his tattoos gang related? Is he likely to be violent? And making matters worse, when they hit his apartment they learn he is moving out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back Behind Bars
programme.desc: While tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland struggles to find time to train and compete for his first boxing match in years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Man
programme.desc: Dog and family head to Kona to track down a wanted father who's looking to bolt to the mainland to evade sentencing. Meanwhile, Dog does some evading of his own - Avoiding the much dreaded birthday party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Courage
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Out of the Ashes
programme.desc: Peter helps restore a Manitoba couples love for logs by building a home to replace the one they tragically lost to fire. Meanwhile, the renovation of a neighborhood bar nearly drives Bryan Jr. to drink.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Frying Pan into the Fire
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. whips up an outdoor kitchen before hitting the beach in search of the ultimate driftwood bar.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Going for Gold
programme.desc: Joel takes on the mother of all builds a 20,000-sq./ft. Pennsylvania mansion complete with walk through tree, hand-carved totem pole and 3-story spiral log staircase.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Take to the Trees
programme.desc: Peter may have met his match when he builds a mountainside ski cabin for a client experienced in log-home building.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Living the Dream
programme.desc: Beat builds a lottery winners 7,000-sq.ft. dream home in northern Alberta. Meanwhile, Peter must beg, borrow and steal to deliver on two high profile entryways for Canadas Winter Games.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Night Sweats
programme.desc: Beat battles a stuck truck in the middle of the night, then builds in darkness to meet his deadline on a home in northern Ontario.

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie cant tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandis insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justices anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says hes a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesnt approve of her friends, doesnt trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he cant trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. Hes tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure hes alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesnt consider it cheating because hes not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he cant take it anymore.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Courage
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Run's House: Rock in Run's House
programme.desc: When Rev hears that his good friend Kid Rock is coming into town he invites him to stay at the house. Russy hopes that Kid will teach him how to play his guitar.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Steps
programme.desc: Justine is babysitting her sister Michelle's eleven month old baby, Ameera, for two nights. The boys look forward to helping their mom baby-sit as long as they don't have to change diapers.

programme.title: Run's House: Mixed and Mastered
programme.desc: With their tracks finally mixed and mastered JoJo, Zach and Reggie, aka "Blackout," are ready to hit the streets and find a record deal.

programme.title: Run's House: Too Cool for Old School
programme.desc: To keep occupied while going to an engineer tech school in the city, JoJo begins an internship at Phat Farm to learn the family business.

programme.title: Run's House: When the Cat's Away...
programme.desc: Justine's Brown Sugar jewelry line is up and running. And better yet, the Home Shopping Network is interested in working with her. So it's off to sunny Tampa to put Justine's jewelry on air.

programme.title: Run's House: Slapped Silly
programme.desc: Every family has its pecking order and being the youngest sure has its drawbacks: like getting picked on, which makes Russy the target of his brothers and sisters annoyance.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Baby Girl
programme.desc: It's time for JoJo and his group, Blackout, to hit the studio and begin recording tracks for their record. However, JoJo, Zach and Reggie are discouraged by the list of producers Latchkey Recordings has available to them.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 1
programme.desc: The upper room of the Leopard Inn are now a set of deserted rooms and corridors that were once a Victorian Hotel, although way past its heyday some of the borders seem to have stayed. This episode sees the team get their most convincing evidence to date.

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 2

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 3

programme.title: World's Greatest: Extreme Animals
programme.desc: Extreme Animals features environments hostile to humans, but havens to many animals. Witness gorgeous glow-worms, high flying condors, parched thorny devils, emperor penguins, and polar bears in this journey through life on the edge.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the worlds most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coasts
programme.desc: Along coasts, one element ends and another begins. No two days are ever the same on a coastline: the only thing that remains a constant is the timeless power of the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: Arthur: The Pageant Pickle/Some Assembly Required
programme.desc: School is almost out and Arthur can hardly wait for those lazy summer days by Muffy's pool. Nothing could ruin such a happy time of year, except maybe D.W.'s Spring Pageant! And then D.W. can't wait to test out her new play set!

programme.title: Arthur: Show Off/Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: It's the Elwood City dog show and Killer is facing off against Sebastian Winkleplotz, the snooty, championship-winning poodle. Arthur agrees to watch Amigo while Alberto's off at camp, but Pal gets worried.

programme.title: Arthur: Feeling Flush/Family Fortune
programme.desc: During a drought, Francine bets Arthur that her family can use less water than his. The TV show, Treasure Caravan, is coming to Elwood City! Arthur and D.W. are convinced they'll find treasures that will make them rich and famous.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Tv-Free Week/Night Fright
programme.desc: The kids and parents of Ellwood City have all pledged not to watch TV for one whole week. Can they last? Then, big, brave Binky Barnes would be toast if people ever discovered he can't sleep without a night light.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Meets Mister Rogers/Draw!
programme.desc: Mister Rogers is staying at Arthur's house! Mister Rogers is a nice guy, but... his show is for babies! Can Arthur hide the visit from his friends? Next, the trouble starts when Fern draws a not-too-flattering cartoon of Francine.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Wrestles with a Story/All Will Be Revealed
programme.desc: Binky spends the day with Bitzi Baxter and learns what it's like to be a news reporter. Then, D.W., Bud, and Rapty set out to solve the mystery of what really happened to D.W.'s snowball.

programme.title: Arthur: Room to Ride/The Frensky Family Fiasco
programme.desc: With Lance Armstrongs support, Binky and his friends take to the streets to convince residents to vote for new bike safety lanes. Francine wants the Frenskys to be closer, but a weekly Family Night turns out to be harder than expected.

programme.title: Arthur: Locked In The Library!/Arthur Accused!
programme.desc: Arthur and Francine are fighting. But when they get locked inside the library they either have to make up or prepare for a long evening. And when Buster opens his detective agency, he has no idea his first job will involve Arthur.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Dummy Disaster/Francine and The Feline
programme.desc: When painfully shy George brings a ventriloquist dummy to school, a popular kid is born! Then, Arthur thinks the best pet to have is a dog, and Francine probably would have agreed--that is, until little Nemo, a cute kitten, came along.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan attacks the USA on 7 Dec 1941. For the next 6 months, they continue to have successful attacks.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Italy's failed attacks in the Mediterranean region draw in the Germans.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Allies turn the tide in the Atlantic, where initially German U-Boats harass freely convoys to supply Britain. The route to bring American soldiers who will land on D-Day is clear.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Their attack on the Soviet Union having failed, the German Army suffers a series of counter-offensives on the Eastern Front. Wehrmacht's losses are huge as the Soviets advance West.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: After a careful campaign of disinformation that throws the German defenders off-guard, the Western Allies finally land on Normandy.France is liberated.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Dylan receives an anonymous text warning him that his online love, Ally, is not who she says she is. After the mystery texter is revealed, Nev and Max uncover a huge web of deceit! (S6, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Danny is intent on building a life with his online love, despite her violent past. But when he enlists Nev and Max to help him meet her, they discover she may have ties to a former Catfish! (S6, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Daisy & Marcus
programme.desc: Daisy met Marcus on Instagram and he instantly stole her heart. But Marcus won't speak to Daisy on the phone, let alone meet her in person, so Nev and Tyler try to arrange a face to face. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After Jonathon's online love disappears, he enlists Nev and Max to help track him down. But when the guys discover a former catfish is involved, they begin to suspect Jonathon himself. (S6, ep13)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Long Islander Catherine has fallen in love with Graham from Tennessee. She's ready to uproot her life to be with him, but Nev and Max discover that Graham's not everything he claims to be. (S5, ep18)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Joe & Kari Ann
programme.desc: Joe was sceptical when Miss Teen USA, Kari, sent him a friend request. Now, after months of communication, Joe thinks it might be the real deal, and he might have found love with her.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 101
programme.desc: Connor is in love with his best friend Brittanie and must try to convince her that he should be more than her "shopping partner." Gabby reveals her feelings to her best friend Nick.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 102
programme.desc: Heather must convince her best friend Gary that she's more than "one of the guys", while Kevin tries to prove to Janine that nice guys finish first.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 103

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 104
programme.desc: Alex wants his best friend Anthony to be his first boyfriend. Dan puts years of friendship on the line to confess his feelings to Katie.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 105
programme.desc: Fitz hopes that confessing his love to his best friend Michelle will lead to love. Shelly thinks that her "clown" persona won't turn off her best friend as she asks him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 106
programme.desc: Jaime has only known Steve for a year but the feelings she has for him make her want to be more than friends. Together Jackie and Frank have lost almost 200 pounds, newly fit Jackie now wants to make Frank her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Hills: Who Do You Trust? / One Big Interruption
programme.desc: Audrina tells Heidi about Spencer's cheating ways, but Heidi is doubtful - until she sees it for herself. Lauren continues to wonder whether she is ready for a relationship. (S2, ep4)

programme.desc: Heidi and Lauren get into a major argument about Spencer as Lauren feels like she is losing Heidi as a friend. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 1
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 2
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Expert Witness
programme.desc: This report focuses on the use of expert witnesses in criminal trials and the problems that arise when their testimony is inaccurate or completely false.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 1
programme.desc: When a celebrity dog trainer is murdered, an heiress fears for her life and a bodyguard vows to be a hero.

programme.desc: Jon mistakenly buys a man-eating fern./Orson tries to get a record player for Bo./Jon becomes a health and exercise nut.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: The Garfield Crime Files examines the cast of the Purse-Snatching Pooches.

programme.desc: Garfield's plan to send Nermal to Abu Dhabi fails./Orson dreams about the knights of the round table./Garfield lectures on what humor is.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon is harassed by a magazine salesman. An escaped saber tooth tiger switches identities with Garfield.

programme.desc: Ichabod Cricket shows up to be Garfields conscience, and everything backfires.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is pretending to be a great detective, and needs a mystery to solve! Barney sees Riff protecting a nest full of duck eggs.
